ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Pet weapons..  Delay or Damage??
ygData.msgSnippet: The best thing to give an enchanter s pet USED to be a summoned dagger, as the pet got the delay of the dagger, but no reduction in damage.  However, with the
ygData.messageBody:
The best thing to give an enchanter's pet USED to be a summoned dagger, as
the pet got the delay of the dagger, but no reduction in damage. However,
with the recent pet changed, the weapon's speed no longer effects pet
speeds, so I don't know what the benefit is anymore. Perhaps a slow,
high-damage weapon would work well, increasing the damage without the
reduction in speed. Anyone willing to experiment? :)

Tinik Gutenungrie
Gnomish Enchanter, Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: <Tri-mix@...>
To: <eqenchanters@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 24, 2001 8:32 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Pet weapons.. Delay or Damage??


Hello everyone,

Can someone please tell me if there is a benefit to giving pets weapons?
Does the Delay or Damage matter or effect the pet in Any way?
I am just wondering whats the best, Fast - Low damage type weapons, or
Slower - Higher Damage weapons. i.e. a FS Dagger vs. a Giant Snake Fang.

Thanks a million in advance,
Gallien
Lvl 23 Enchanter - Brell
